const categories = [ { name: 'Fish', href: '#', imageSrc: 'https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/home-page-01-category-01.jpg', }, { name: 'Shrimp', href: '#', imageSrc: 'https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/home-page-01-category-02.jpg', }, { name: 'Mussets', href: '#', imageSrc: 'https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/home-page-01-category-04.jpg', }, ] export default function CategorySection() { return (

Seafood by Category

{categories.map((category) => ( {category.name} ))}
) }
